Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.formats.hpo

Interface HpoDisease

All Superinterfaces:
AnnotatedItem, Identified
public interface HpoDisease extends AnnotatedItem
Model of a disease from the HPO annotations.

The main purpose here is to separate phenotypic abnormalities from mode of inheritance and other annotations.

Version:
0.2.1 (2017-11-16)
Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe, Sebastian Koehler, Peter Robinson, Daniel Danis

    • diseaseName

      String diseaseName()
      Returns:
      disease name, e.g. Marfan syndrome.

    • annotations

      Collection<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> annotations()
      Specified by:
      annotations in interface AnnotatedItem
      Returns:
      iterable over ALL disease annotations, both present and absent.

    • annotationCount

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="2.0.0-RC5") default int annotationCount()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use annotations() size.
      Returns:
      number of annotations present in the disease.

    • modesOfInheritance

      List<TermId> modesOfInheritance()

    • presentAnnotations

      default Iterable<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> presentAnnotations()
      Returns:
      iterable over PRESENT disease annotations. These are the annotations that were observed in at least one individual of a cohort.

    • absentAnnotations

      default Iterable<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> absentAnnotations()
      Returns:
      iterable over ABSENT disease annotations. These are the annotations that were NOT observed in any individuals of a cohort.

    • annotationStream

      default Stream<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> annotationStream()
      Returns:
      stream of ALL disease annotations, both present and absent.

    • presentAnnotationsStream

      default Stream<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> presentAnnotationsStream()
      Returns:
      stream of PRESENT disease annotations. These are the annotations that were observed in at least one individual of a cohort.

    • absentAnnotationsStream

      default Stream<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> absentAnnotationsStream()
      Returns:
      stream of ABSENT disease annotations. These are the annotations that were NOT observed in any individuals of a cohort.

    • diseaseOnset

      default Optional<TemporalInterval> diseaseOnset()
      Returns:
      temporal interval representing earliest and latest onset of HpoDiseaseAnnotations of the disease.

    • getAnnotation

      default Optional<HpoDiseaseAnnotation> getAnnotation(TermId termId)
      Users can user this function to get the HpoTermId corresponding to a TermId
      Parameters:
      termId - id of the plain TermId for which we want to have the HpoDiseaseAnnotation.
      Returns:
      optional with HpoDiseaseAnnotation

    • getFrequencyOfTermInDisease

      default Optional<Ratio> getFrequencyOfTermInDisease(TermId termId)
      Returns the mean frequency of the feature in the disease.
      Parameters:
      termId - id of an HPO term
      Returns:
      frequency of the phenotypic feature in individuals with the annotated disease

    • annotationTermIds

      default Stream<TermId> annotationTermIds()
      Returns:
      stream of disease annotation IDs.

    • annotationTermIdList

      default List<TermId> annotationTermIdList()
      Returns:
      a list of disease annotation IDs.

    • isAnnotatedTo

      default boolean isAnnotatedTo(TermId termId, MinimalOntology hpo)
      Check if termId is annotated to any of the terms to which this disease is annotated including their ancestors.
      Parameters:
      termId - a query term.
      hpo - HPO ontology.
      Returns:
      true iff this disease is annotated to the term directly or via annotation propagation.

    • isDirectlyAnnotatedTo

      default boolean isDirectlyAnnotatedTo(TermId termId)
      Parameters:
      termId - ID of an HPO Term
      Returns:
      true if there is a direct annotation to termId. Does not include indirect annotations from annotation propagation rule.

    • isDirectlyAnnotatedToAnyOf

      default boolean isDirectlyAnnotatedToAnyOf(Set<TermId> termIds)
      Parameters:
      termIds - Set of ids of HPO Terms
      Returns:
      true if there is a direct annotation to any of the terms in termIds. Does not include indirect annotations from annotation propagation rule.
